Chinese: 真是的，你怎麼老是慢吞吞～！！
German: Mensch! Immer bist du so spät dran!

English:
What is it? Something or other?
Working on boss-man time?!
Chinese:
搞什麼嘛！還是說？你以為自己是什麼大人物嗎！？
覺得王牌要留到最後才登場！？！？
Korean:
대체 뭐야? 그건 그거야? 중역 출근?
주인공은 나중에 등장한다, 같은!?!?
German:
Was ist denn? Wieder irgendwas?
Mal wieder auf Kosten der Chefin unterwegs?!

English: There, there, Nokia. Maybe go easy this time.
Chinese: 好了好了，諾奇雅，這次妳就放他一馬吧！
Korean: 자자 노키아, 이번엔 너그러이 봐 주자고
German:
Ganz ruhig, Nokia.
Sei dieses Mal doch nicht so schroff.

English:
You've got a point. After all, [p]
is an important aid to the Rebels. I guess 
maybe I could let things slide.
Chinese:
……也～是～啦～[p]是我們反叛者重要的幫手嘛～
這次我就大人不計小人過！
Korean:
…그러~네~ [p]는(은) 우리들 리벨리온즈의
소중한 도우미니까~ 선처하도록 할까~
German:
Da hast du recht. [p] ist den Rebels
schließlich eine wichtige Hilfe. Ich will mal
nicht so sein.

English:
All right, everyone!
Here's my helper for today's training!
Chinese: 各位——！接下來向大家介紹今天的特訓小幫手喔！
German:
So, allerseits! Hier ist meine Unterstützung für
das heutige Training!

English:
The unstoppable Cyber Sleuth and new Super Hacker:
[p], the Golden Maniac!
Chinese:
讓我們歡迎神秘MAX的電腦偵探、幹練新星超級駭客——
「[p]☆Golden Maniacs」！
Korean:
불가해함 MAX인 전뇌탐정이자 수완가인 신인 슈퍼 해커
「[p]☆골든 매니악스」입니다!
German:
Der unaufhaltsame Cyber-Detektiv und seit Neuestem
auch Super-Hacker: [p],
das Goldene Wunderkind!

English:
[p] the Golden Maniac?
The one who took down that strange hacker group,
the Demons?!
Chinese:
[p]☆Golden Maniacs
不就是打爆了那個奇怪的駭客集團——惡魔亂舞的人嗎！？
Korean:
[p]☆골든 매니악스라면
그 묘한 해커 집단, 데몬즈를 날려 버렸다는!?
German:
[p] das Goldene Wunderkind?
Hast du nicht diese komische Hackergruppe
ausgeschaltet, die Demons?!

English:
[p] the Golden Maniac?
The gifted hacker that successfully managed to
infiltrate Kamishiro?!
Chinese:
我記得[p]☆Golden Maniacs
是成功潛入神代的駭客高手……
Korean:
[p]☆골든 매니악스라고 하면
그 카미시로의 잠입에 성공한 솜씨 좋은 해커였지…
German:
[p] das Goldene Wunderkind?
Hast du dich nicht sogar bei Kamishiro
reingehackt?

English:
That's right!
That [p] the Golden Maniac.
My total bestie finest, fiercest confidant!
Chinese:
說的沒錯！你們口中的神人[p]☆Golden Maniacs，
就是我更勝知己的超級死黨啦！
Korean:
그렇습니다! 바로 그 [p]☆골든 매니악스와
난, 절친을 능가하는 LOVE친구란 말씀!
German:
Jawohl!
[p] das Goldene Wunderkind.
Meine liebste und geschätzteste Vertrauensperson!

English:
What do you think? Who better to help train the
Rebels! All right, go on, then,
[p] the Golden Maniac!
Chinese:
如何？還有比他更適合當特訓對手的人嗎？
那接下來就拜託你啦，[p]☆Golden Maniacs！
Korean:
어때? 우리들 리벨리온즈의 특훈 상대로 더할 나위 없지!?
그럼 잘 부탁해, [p]☆골든 매니악스!
German:
Na, was meinst du? Wer könnte die Rebels denn
besser trainieren! Also dann, nichts wie los,
[p] das Goldene Wunderkind!

English:
OK, I'll go first!
Here we go!
Chinese:
好！我要當第一個！
上啊——！！
